p: In this study, STIs were common in single (86%) and married women (61%) indicating that sexual behavior could be associated with infection [ 51]. Women may possibly engage in risky sexual acts to achieve motherhood or to sexually satisfy their partner. More information about womenâ€™s sexual behavior was hindered by the taboo around sexual disclosure. In the current study, the total number of single women who participated was low since the annual gynecologic exam as a routine checkup for single women is not a common practice in Lebanon.
